A collection of light probes arranged within a given space can improve lighting on moving objects and static LOD scenery within that space. More info See in Glossary easier to use by automating placement. They also provide higher quality, more accurate lighting, because they light per-pixel not per-object. Bake multiple scenes together with Baking Sets Add scenes A Scene contains the environments and menus of your game. Think of each unique Scene file as a unique level. In each Scene, you place your environments, obstacles, and decorations, essentially designing and building your game in pieces. More info See in Glossary to a Baking Set so you can bake the lighting for all the scenes together.
